title: Harry Potter comes to Apple's iBooks for the first time
text: Apple Harry Potter comes to Apple's iBooks for the first time All seven Harry Potter books are now available as enhanced editions for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch, featuring animations and illustrations for a new generation of readers The Hogwarts Express: how the animation appears in Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
